name: Spider Demon VR
description:
how to download: click on install open the project link your oculus quest headset with the link cable on your pc and play.

controlls:  click on the controller button left the teleport, rotate with the left controller, grab to grab objects.

how to play:  click on play, run from the spider seek the hammer, grab the hammer go to the light and touch it with the hammer the door then you go to the green and you win.

if there are any bugs say it in the comments i try to fix it.
